name: RugbyWorldCupScores
0:
”Alexa, ask Rugby Scores what are the world cup scores”
”Alexa, ask Rugby Scores what is the England score”
”Alexa, ask Rugby Scores when do Scotland play”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rugby scores
des:
"Alexa, ask Rugby Scores for the World Cup scores"

Use this skill to get the latest scores from the Rugby World Cup. Or you can ask for a specific team, or for the next fixture for a team. Match times will be in your local time zone.

You can now ask for scores in any of the following competitions:

The World Cup
The Six Nations Championship
The European Challenge Cup
The European Champions Cup
Super Rugby
The English Premiership
The English Championship
English National League One
English National League Two
The Pro14
The French Top 14
The Welsh Premiership
The Welsh Championship
Welsh Division One
The Scottish Premiership
Scottish National League Division One
Scottish National League Division Two
Scottish National League Division Three
Irish League Division 1A
Irish League Division 1B
The Premiership Rugby Cup
The Championship Cup
The Womens English Premiership
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
